Description: Invitation to private view for pictures of Egypt by Ellis, at his studio on 30th and 31st of March, sent to William Hamo Thornycroft; view with barges sailing on body of water, one in the right foreground and several behind, town on the land in the background. c.1897-9 Etching, printed in brown ink
Curator's comments: Ellis exhibited two paintings of Egypt in RA, one in 1897 and the other in 1899. This invitation was to preview either of them before RA.
